Bruce Fogelson has over 25 years experience in real estate showing a diverse and large body of work. Bruce spent his very early years in Indianapolis but grew up in Chicago, the city he calls home today. Fogelson spent his college years in Denver, Colorado at the University of Denver earning a degree in Real Estate Development and finance. Before, during and after college he learned to enjoy skiing, climbing and camping.
